enlighten.term.buff:
Buffs are effects that boost a player or monster's stats for a duration or while a condition is met.

Unless otherwise stated, Buffs of the same type do not stack — only the copy with the strongest effect applies.
enlighten.term.area: This Skill has an effect that applies to every target in its area, rather than picking specific targets.
enlighten.term.cast_speed_to_cooldown: When cast, Hastebound will count the cast speed as cooldown.
enlighten.term.chaining:
Effects that Chain are redirected to another target after hitting an enemy.

Projectiles have a base chaining distance of 5 metres. Enemies can be Hit more than once in the same Chain.
enlighten.term.curse:
Curses significantly [Debuff](debuff) affected targets.

Different Curses can exist on the same target at the same time.
enlighten.term.damage: Damage are spells that do damage to the targets.
enlighten.term.heal: Heal are spells that replenish health of the targets
enlighten.term.magic:
Magic are spells that use raw magic to destroy your enemies.

[Weapon skill](weapon_skill) are not Magics.
enlighten.term.melee:
Melee spells are those that directly hit with a melee Strike or a Slam, dealing Melee damage.

Any Projectiles these spells create do not count as Melee damage.
enlighten.term.movement: Movement are spells that allow you to move for a distance.
enlighten.term.not_affected_by_cast_spee: When cast, cast speed will not affect Stasis.
enlighten.term.projectile:
A Projectile is a moving object or [Spell](spell) that usually impacts with targets when it hits them.

When a group of multiple Projectiles is fired from the same source at the same time, a single target can be hit by all Projectiles unless otherwise specified.
enlighten.term.spell:
In MAS, all learnable skills will be considered as Spell.

The stat of Spell is fully determined by caster's stat.
enlighten.term.rejuvenate:
Rejuvenate heal target over time.

Rejuvenate isn't [Buff](buff).
enlighten.term.self_damage: Self damage are spells that do damage to its caster, the damage won't be calculating again when cast.
enlighten.term.shatter: Shatter are spells that trigger the [Freeze](freeze) build up, release all accumulated damage as bonus §b☀ Cold§7§9 Damage.
enlighten.term.summon:
Summons are spells that summon temporary [Allies](allies) which will accompany and fight alongside you.

By default, player can only have 3 summoned allies at most.
enlighten.term.thorns: Thorns are spells that can apply Thorned to enemy.
enlighten.term.trap:
Traps are constructs which will be trigger when enemy getting closer. 

Traps doesn't have quantity limitation.
enlighten.term.weapon_skill:
Weapon skill are spells that directly use your equipped weapon to damage enemies. 

Weapon skill do not necessarily deal Physical damage — they can deal any damage type.
